institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Continuing employment incentive payment and operating rules/Article 11 (Recovery of refunds due to misconduct, etc.)
contents: Article 11 (Recovery of refund due to fraudulent activity, etc.) ① The Chairman of the Board shall suspend payment of incentives to applicants, applicants for payment, or persons eligible for payment by the Minister of Employment and Labor pursuant to Article 19 of the Act and Article 24 (1) of the Decree, or if payment has already been received. If the return of the incentive is ordered, the payment of the incentive must be stopped or the previously paid incentive must be recovered. ② The Chairman shall not allow the person eligible for payment or the applicant for payment to use false or other fraudulent means, such as by submitting false application documents under Article 5. In accordance with Article 24 (2) of the Decree, the incentive shall not be provided for the following periods: 1. If support has already been received: 5 years from the date of last receipt of support; 2. In case of attempting to receive support: 5 years from the date of attempting to receive support, such as making an application by false or other illegal methods. ③ For those eligible for subsidy under paragraph 3, the reason for the subsidy decision must be specified in attached Form No. 5. and notify.
